name: Kalani
description:
Adds: {calculate}
After an enemy ship executes a maneuver, if it is in the {ab} of a friendly ship at range 0-3, you may spend 1 {charge}. If you do, that friendly ship may choose to acquire a lock on that enemy ship, and gain 1 stress token.

name: Kraken
description:
Adds: {calculate}
During the End Phase, you may choose up to 3 friendly ships at range 0-3. If you do, each of these ships does not remove 1 calculate token.

name: TV-94
description: While a friendly ship at range 0-3 performs a primary attack against a defender in its {ab}, if there are 2 or fewer attack dice, it may spend 1 calculate token to add 1 {hit} result.

name: K2-B4
description: While a friendly ship at range 0-3 defends, it may spend 1 calculate token. If it does, add 1 {evade} result unless the attacker chooses to gain 1 strain token.

name: TA-175
description: After a friendly ship at range 0-3 with {calculate} on its action bar is destroyed, each friendly ship at range 0-3 with {calculate} in its action bar gains 1 calculate token.
